markdownRemark.html: One valuable use of code is creating small code for repeating small tasks that is very routinary in nature. I am currently now tackling a project for my boss that does that. It solves a few headaches for customers and the team plus allowing computers to do this simple but repititive jobs gives me more time to focus on the right problems to solve with the limited resources that I have.
